amendment.description: To provide trade promotion authority for the Trans-Pacific Partnership Agreement and for other trade agreements.

action.text: Amendment SA 626 proposed by Senator McConnell to Amendment SA 633.
Amendment SA 626 as modified, under the order of 9/20/2011, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 55. Record Vote Number: 141.
